data.actual_result: The bar showing the progress of a file upload just fills up then reseta
data.expected_result: It should tell you your files are too powerfull
data.short_description: If you send a video that is too large the file bar will be stuck in loop
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your gallery - Choose a video over the 8mb limit (works with non nitro) - Share with discord - Choose someone's dm - After pressing send while it is loading press the x in the top left corner - (can reproduce)
